snippet: The recall is of 778,000 RAV4 and Lexus HS 250h models sold in the United States is to fix a problem in the rear suspension that Toyota says arises when the vehicles are serviced.
abstract: The recall is of 778,000 RAV4 and Lexus HS 250h models sold in the United States is to fix a problem in the rear suspension that Toyota says arises when the vehicles are serviced.

headline.main: Toyota Recalls RAV4 and Lexus HS 250h to Fix Rear Suspension Issue

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Lexus Division of Toyota Motor Sales USA
